Vision Insurance

Using your insurance on Glasses.com is easy and simple, as we accept most vision insurance plans, including EyeMed, Davis Vision and Superior Vision. Just search for yours from the panel below.

OOPS! LOOKS LIKE WE'RE HAVING TROUBLE FINDING YOU.

Make sure the information you entered matches your insurance plan, or add a few more details to help us find you.

OOPS! LOOKS LIKE WE'RE HAVING TROUBLE FINDING YOU.

Due to a technical problem, we're having trouble retrieving this information. Please try again in 5 minutes.

OOPS! LOOKS LIKE THERE ARE NO BENEFITS TO APPLY.

We found your insurance but unfortunately it looks like your plan doesn't have benefits to apply, or that you might not be eligible. Have a check with your insurance provider.

SO SORRY, TOO MANY FAILS

For your security, we've temporarily locked the insurance look up.

You may try again in 5 minutes.

If you need additional support or assistance, please contact us at you can contact the customer service at 1-800-GLASSES (800-452-7737) or send an email to info@glasses.com, and they will help you as best they can.

Having trouble finding your insurance provider? Chat with us

We also accept out-of-network plans

You may also use out-of-network benefits at Glasses.com for most other vision insurance companies, like VSP and Spectera. You can submit the claim form directly to your insurance company. Download Form

For your security, your personal benefit information is only available during your session and will be erased when you close your browser.
